statements.sql: select count(tours.id) as total_tours,tour_categories.category_name from `tours` inner join `tour_categories` on `tour_categories`.`id` = `tours`.`category_id` group by `tours`.`category_id`, `tour_categories`.`category_name`

statements.sql: select count(id) as total_search, page_url from `user_logs` where `page_url` like '%location%' group by `page_url` order by `total_search` desc limit 10

select count(id) as total_search, page_url from `user_logs` where `page_url` like '%search%' or `page_url` like '%location%' or `page_url` like '%attractions%' group by `page_url` order by `total_search` desc limit 10
